title: GWARbar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The intergalactic heavy metal band GWAR owns this metal/punk bar and restaurant in the Jackson Ward neighborhood of Richmond. The bar features craft beer and creative cocktails. The dinner menu offers clearly labeled vegan choices such as the featured favorite Hail Seitan which is a sloppy juicy sandwich made with bbq seitan, onion confit, fennel slaw and hot sauce. Other vegan items include a marinated twin oaks tofu, artichoke, herb salad and mushroom bacon sandwich; beer battered buffalo cauliflower or artichoke hearts with vegan ranch; made-in-house chicken nuggets, and an in-house-made Italian sausage with caramelized onions and sauteed red peppers, among other dishes. The brunch menu includes a vegan scramble and others.
